Get around PGDay Oz

From the Airport

Tullamarine Airport is the primary airport serving the city. Besides Taxi and Uber service you can reach the city center (CBD) by SkyBus. More information is available Here .

Public Tranport

Melbourne has a great Tram network. Hopping on a tram is free within the CBD area. Find here more information on the Public Transport Victoria .
